tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE landmarks (
  landmark_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  landmark_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  landmark_description TEXT,
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8) NOT NULL,
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE landmarks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE countries (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  population INT,
  area DECIMAL,
  capital VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE regions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  area DECIMAL,
  landmarks_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE visits (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  landmark_id INT,
  visitor_id INT,
  visit_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE categories (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100)
)
